blogPost.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.body: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
blogPost.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
blogPost.author: Molly Waldron

localize.description: ICONFi是一个数字资产储蓄平台。ICONFi可以让你赚取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在内的数字资产的利息，并提供一个简单的ICX押注解决方案。ICONFi以简单、安全的用户界面帮助你增加投资。
ICONFi是一個數字資產儲蓄平臺。ICONFi可以讓你賺取包括BTC、ETH、ICX和USDT在內的數字資產的利息，並提供一個簡單的ICX押注解決方案。ICONFi以簡單、安全的用戶界面幫助你增加投資。

previous.excerpt: No more messy bookmarks. No more missing out. Dev Resources has everything a developer needs, presented in curated lists. Improve your skill set, find assets, discover your next favourite tool and get great discounts on digital products — all in one place.
previous.title: Dev Resources - Collaborative list of resources for developers

localize.description: 不再有凌乱的书签。不再错过。开发资源拥有开发者所需的一切，并以精选列表的形式呈现。提高您的技能，寻找资产，发现您下一个最喜欢的工具，并获得数字产品的巨大折扣 - 所有这些都在一个地方。
不再有凌亂的書籤。不再錯過。開發資源擁有開發者所需的一切，並以精選列表的形式呈現。提高您的技能，尋找資產，發現您下一個最喜歡的工具，並獲得數字產品的巨大折扣 - 所有這些都在一個地方。

next.excerpt: You probably have a few social media accounts... We built Luma to be your home online, between the big networks. Share your Luma to connect with your audience, showcase your content, and make money.
next.title: Luma Profile - A homepage for creators to showcase their content

localize.description: 你可能有几个社交媒体账户... ... 我们建立的Luma是您的网上家园，在各大网络之间。分享您的Luma来与您的观众联系，展示您的内容，并赚钱。
localize.tagline: 为创作者提供一个展示其内容的主页。

localize.description: 你可能有幾個社交媒體賬戶... ... 我們建立的Luma是您的網上家園，在各大網絡之間。分享您的Luma來與您的觀衆聯繫，展示您的內容，並賺錢。
localize.tagline: 爲創作者提供一個展示其內容的主頁。
